queries.query: EXEC sp_executesql N'SELECT cpu_count AS [Logical CPU Count] , scheduler_count, hyperthread_ratio AS [Hyperthread Ratio] , cpu_count/hyperthread_ratio AS [Physical CPU Count] , physical_memory_kb/1024 AS [Physical Memory (MB)] , committed_kb/1024 AS [Committed Memory (MB)] , committed_target_kb/1024 AS [Committed Target Memory (MB)] , max_workers_count AS [Max Workers Count] , affinity_type_desc AS [Affinity Type] , sqlserver_start_time AS [SQL Server Start Time] , virtual_machine_type_desc AS [Virtual Machine Type] FROM sys.dm_os_sys_info WITH (NOLOCK) OPTION (RECOMPILE)'

EXEC sp_executesql N'SELECT cpu_count AS [Logical CPU Count] , scheduler_count, hyperthread_ratio AS [Hyperthread Ratio] , cpu_count/hyperthread_ratio AS [Physical CPU Count] , physical_memory_in_bytes/1024/1024 AS [Physical Memory (MB)] , bpool_committed/128 AS [Committed Memory (MB)] , bpool_commit_target/128 AS [Committed Target Memory (MB)] , max_workers_count AS [Max Workers Count] , affinity_type_desc AS [Affinity Type] , sqlserver_start_time AS [SQL Server Start Time] , virtual_machine_type_desc AS [Virtual Machine Type] FROM sys.dm_os_sys_info WITH (NOLOCK) OPTION (RECOMPILE)'
